00027 #include "nsISupports.idl"
00028 
00029 interface sbIMediaItem;
00030 
00031 /*
00032 Class: PlaylistClickEvent
00033 
00034 A <PlaylistClickEvent> is passed to any event handlers listening for the
00035 PlaylistCellClick event fired on the document object.  This event object also
00036 has some of the properties of MouseEvent.
00037 
00038 Note that the <Songbird> object must be accessed before any events will be raised.
00039 This will likely change in the future.
00040 
00041 Example:
00042   (start code)
00043   function onPlaylistCellClick( aEvent ) {
00044     // we can get the property that was clicked on...
00045     alert(aEvent.property);
00046     
00047     // or the <MediaItem>
00048     alert(aEvent.item.guid);
00049     
00050     // as well as key states from MouseEvent
00051     alert(aEvent.ctrlKey);
00052   }
00053   
00054   // initialize the event system
00055   songbird;
00056   
00057   // attach the event handler
00058   document.addEventListener("PlaylistCellClick", onPlaylistCellClick, false);
00059   (end code)
00060 
00061   See Also:
00062     <MediaItem>
00063     <http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/DOM:event>
00064     <http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/DOM:element.addEventListener>
00065 */
00066 
00072 [scriptable, uuid(83b06ce0-b364-4861-afff-9b8de773cd75)]
00073  interface sbIPlaylistClickEvent : nsISupports
00074 {
00075   /*
00076   Prop: property
00077   
00078   The name of the property (column) that was clicked on
00079   
00080   Type: String
00081   
00082   See Also:
00083     <MediaItem::getProperty()>
00084   */
00085   readonly attribute AString property;
00086   
00087   /*
00088   Prop: item
00089   
00090   The <MediaItem> that was clicked on
00091   
00092   Type: <MediaItem>
00093   */
00094   readonly attribute sbIMediaItem item;
00095 };
